name: Zonal Welfare Council
briefDescription: In 1990, the formation of ZWC was initiated by a band of dedicated youth on the basis of their social commitments wanted to play an organised role in sharing peoples development. This led to establishment of an office in a cottage in Joyrampur village of Bishnupur Block - I&II. They started working with the people of 20 villages of Diamond Harbour Block-II and Kanganberia in the district 24 Parganas (South) of West Bengal.Mission - To Help Poor & Needy people of India
